example.eg: I asked him to stop, but he did it anyway.  He didn't know exactly what it was, but he wanted it anyway.
example.egtrans: 我叫他别闹了，可他根本不听。他确切不了解到底是什么，即便这样，他也想要。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 尽管, 即使这样, 即便如此

dsense.name: anyway, also US: anyways
dsense.guideword: informal (resuming previous topic) (非正式用语，用来回到原来的话题)

example.eg: Anyway, we eventually found a place to eat.
example.egtrans: 不管怎样，我们还是找到了个吃饭的地方。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 不管怎样, 总之, 话说回来

dsense.name: anyway, also US: anyways
dsense.guideword: (signalling change of topic) (表示转换话题)

example.eg: Anyway, I have to leave now.
Is there any way you could make your essay more interesting?
